Item.method_code:
Dim identityID As String = Me.GetProperty("related_id") If identityID = "" Then Return Nothing
Dim q As Item = Me.NewItem("Identity", "get") q.SetAttribute("id", identityID) q.SetAttribute("select", "is_alias,keyed_name") Dim r As Item = q.Apply() If r.GetProperty("is_alias") = "1" Then Return Nothing
Return Me.getInnovator().NewError("Error with Assignment to Identity '" + r.GetProperty("keyed_name") + "', Assignee is not an Alias.")
Item.name: Validate Activity2 Assignment
